isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - ROCKWELL TANDEM AXLE FORWARD REAR DRIVE UNITS - GENERAL INFORMATION - APPLICATION OF SILICONE GASKET MATERIAL

note.para: The following silicone gasket products or equivalent can be used for Rockwell components:

item.para: Dow Corning Silicone Rubber Sealant, No. 732 Black.

warning.para: Small amounts of acid vapor are present when applying silicone gasket material. To prevent possible serious personal injury, make sure there is good ventilation in the work area. If the silicone gasket material gets in your eyes, flush your eyes with water for 15 minutes. Have your eyes checked by a doctor.

step1.para: Remove all old gasket material from both surfaces ( Figure 67).

figure.caption: Figure 67. Remove Old Gasket Material and Clean Surfaces

step1.para: Clean the surfaces where silicone gasket material will be applied. Remove all oil, grease, dirt and moisture ( Figure 67). Surfaces must be dry.

caution.para: The amount of silicone gasket material applied must not exceed a .125 inch (3 mm) diameter bead. Too much gasket material can block lubrication passages and result in damage to the components.

step1.para: Apply a .125 inch (3 mm) diameter continuous bead of the silicone gasket material around one surface. Also apply the gasket material around the edge of all fastener holes on that surface ( Figure 68).

Assemble the components immediately to permit the silicone gasket material to compress evenly between the parts. Tighten fasteners to the required torque value for that size fastener. Refer to the Torque Chart.
Wait 20 minutes before filling the assembly with lubricant.
